title: Relaxation with a view
text: I recently had the privilege to be treated to a day of pampering at the Lanzerac Spa and I can honestly say that I walked away utterly refreshed and rejuvenated. The view over the vineyard towards the mountains is breathtaking and the inside decor and layout extremely tasteful. I was very impressed with the staff - from the lady who greeted me on arrival, to the gentleman who made me a delicious coffee, to the beauty therapist who indulged all my senses - they were all incredibly polite and professional. Thank you. Lanzerac Spa can be extremely proud of the facelift it underwent recently - it is quite simply gorgeous. There is a fantastic "flow" to the building and it has been well designed to cleverly let the light filter in at all the right places. I also felt that the spiral staircase added an elegant and understated grandeur to the place, and as I ascended, I almost felt as ifI was being transported to a "magical, faraway realm". I look forward to visiting again.
